product_name: Tifosi Wisp Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: The Tifosi Wisp Fototec(TM) Photochromic sunglasses automatically adjust tint in changing light, accommodating both sunny and hazy conditions. Fototec lenses darken in bright light and lighten in dim conditions. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Temple ends adjust for personalized fit and comfort. Interchangeable design allows you to swap out lenses when the lighting changes (additional lenses not included). Best fits extra small to small faces. Tifosi Wisp Fototec Photochromic sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Tifosi Wisp Fototec(TM) Photochromic sunglasses automatically adjust tint in changing light, accommodating both sunny and hazy conditions.
